name: Fatal Strike
description: Fatal Strike is an exciting 2D fighting game set in a cybernetic future.  The game features a simple-to-learn combat system, which still has the depth to reward those who put the time into mastering the mechanics.  This is a three button fighting game with a short-ranged fast light attack, a slower, longer-ranged medium attack, and a dashing heavy attack (charged by holding the medium attack button).  There is a also a parry which allows players to parry any incoming attacks.  The game is completely ground-based with no jumping.  The focus of the game is on the neutral game, with players moving side to side and whiff-punishing one another.  The mechanics are designed to be easy to understand but still deep, and reward mastery.  The game has a training mode toggle on  the stage select screen  which allows the player to see an informational display on any stage so that the controls can be learned.  The other mode is a local versus mode which you can enjoy with a friend.  We hope you have fun and thank you for checking out Fatal Strike!
